price: 119 Vous qui croyez ! Craignez Allah et comportez-vous en hommes véridiques et sincères !
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَكُونُواْ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha wakūnū maʿa al-ṣādiqīna
